meta_title: Why Lubrication Schedules Fail to Prevent Bearing Failure
meta_description: Lubrication schedules fail because they ignore real-time bearing conditions, leading to over-lubrication, seal rupture, and heat-induced grease degradation.
title: Why Calendar-Based Lubrication Schedules Fail to Prevent Bearing Failures
keyword: why lubrication schedules don't stop bearing failures
